name: Causeway (Crescent Moon Games)
description:
In the year 2056, humanity relies on AI systems

to maintain infrastructure in all areas of society.

A breach in the system leads to the disconnect

of highway and navigation systems, and it is

the player’s job to take over and build new roads.

Face new challenges at every

level with more areas needing to be connected,

obstacles to avoid, and power systems to manage.
